mapper.select: select * from onFlight where apId1 in (select apId from Airport where cId=(select cId from City where cName=#{estimateCity})) and apId2 in (select apId from Airport where cId=(select cId from City where cName=#{arriveCity})) and ofTime = #{estimateTime}
mapper.insert: insert into onFlight(ofId, ofTime, ofEstimateTime1, ofActualTime1, ofGate, ofAirTime, ofAirLine1, ofAirLine2, fId, apId1, apId2) select #{ofId}, #{ofTime}, #{ofEstimateTime1}, #{ofActualTime1}, #{ofGate}, #{ofAirTime}, #{ofAirLine1}, #{ofAirLine2}, #{fId}, #{apId1}, #{apId2}
mapper.update: update onFlight set ofAirLine1 = #{ofAirLine1}, ofAirLine2 = #{ofAirLine2} where ofId = #{ofId}
